name: Dragon Masks Run
description:
Dragon Masks Run is a super adventure of super hero kids in various city worlds.
Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging. Switch color buttons, choose between various dragon heroes. Each of them has a special power to help you.
Collect coins and other valuables along the way to increase score. Take advantage of the power of the moonlight to escape traps, obstacles, defeat enemies and completed your target.
